detectors.description:
DeFiLending._updateInterest(address) (contracts/DeFiLending.sol#124-145) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- annualInterest = (user.deposited * DEPOSIT_RATE) / 100 (contracts/DeFiLending.sol#134)
	- interest = (annualInterest * timePassed) / 31536000 (contracts/DeFiLending.sol#135)
